SummaryEnglish: Liza Luna is an alien who wants to destroy Earth upon her first look. But the planet has a plethora of good things, and it would be a pity for her not to check it out. Thus, Earth is spared from destruction, and the alien starts to wander around places. Soon, Liza ends up in a cat cafe, where she will encounter creatures that are beyond her understanding.

1.SummaryEnglish: The Azatoth Empire’s Thrale research vessel approaches Earth. Its captain Liza Luna makes the command to deploy the ToxiCloud and purge all lifeforms from the planet!

2.SummaryEnglish: The Azatoth Empire's reign spans a myriad of stars and planets and they've set their sights on Earth. However, they’ve never seen anything as adorable as kitty cats before!

3.SummaryEnglish: Invading alien Liza Luna thought kitty cats were the cutest thing on the whole planet Earth. Just wait until she sees dogs!

4.SummaryEnglish: Liza decides to show Kasumi and the others the unknown creature Manuru, ranked 1st for 128 consecutive years in the ranking of the cutest animals in the universe! Then linguistic analysis specialist Fiana receives a request from Liza to translate the language of cats.

5.SummaryEnglish: Liza learns that sweet little kitty cats are related to lions and tigers, gigantic kings of the jungle! She just HAS to investigate!

6.SummaryEnglish: Liza learns more about cat-like behaviors around water and tries to wash Firmament away. Kasumi offers a trip to the zoo to see capybaras bathing in hot springs.

7.SummaryEnglish: Liza goes hard on cat merch! Even her teacups are cat shaped. She can't help but collect them. Such is the fate of cat owners.

8.SummaryEnglish: So many fur babies, so little time! There’s no shortage of sweet doggos, cute kitties and beautiful bunnies. Who’s going to grab the most attention?

9.SummaryEnglish: Liza sets her sights on a new obsession: bunnies! Their cuteness can only be described as otherworldly.

10.SummaryEnglish: Liza wants to show you her cat pictures. Please? Look at this sweet little kitty cat!

11.SummaryEnglish: Mithra isn't the biggest fan of Mecha-Yozora, so Liza believes she might be able to withstand the cuteness of cats.

12.SummaryEnglish: Things are going to get ugly before they return to cuteness in the finale of Too Cute Crisis!
